entry.title: Stealth One Piece
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Performance One Pieces
Price: 215.00

The new Stealth One-piece is the perfect workout all-in-one, detailed with a sleek combination of high gloss and matt recycled performance fabrics shaping the torso. The upper body has a built-in bra with removable bra cups and a mesh back for ventilation with high visibility signature chevron details.   Wear this for low-mid intensity workouts by itself or style it to-and-from the gym. 

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small. This style runs true to size. 

Fabrics made in Italy, 65% Recycled Polyamide, 35% Elastane. Garment made in Portugal.

entry.title: Mini Pivot Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 130.00

The Mini Pivot skirt is the perfect light-weight summer cover-up designed to be worn over our technical knit hotties, long leggings or one piece either at the gym or to take you to and from.  Available in limited numbers the Mini Pivot Skirt is a short mesh layering skirt, with a drawstring waistband to secure your perfect fit.  MAIN: 100% Polyester

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, waist 24” / 61cm, hips 34” / 86cm

The Mini Pivot skirt may re-shape when wet, should be hung when storing and drying.

entry.title: Performance Cross Back Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 35.00

This lightweight, fitted tank is a must-have for any wardrobe. The fine, moisture-wicking fabric, internal support at the chest and mesh insert at the small of the back ensure comfort when working out, while the slim fit, dipped hem, delicate straps and loop over cross back make it eminently wearable for any occasion. Made from 72% Polyamide 28% Elastane.

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Pivot Pleated Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 135.00

PROMOTION EXCLUSION

This style is a Lucas Hugh exclusive. Make moves in the Pivot Skirt, a midi-length mesh layering skirt, with a drawstring waistband to secure your perfect fit, pockets and front slits for movement. Designed to be worn over leggings to transition your look from gym to cafe. MAIN: 100% Polyester

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, waist 24” / 61cm, hips 34” / 86cm

The Pivot skirt may re-shape when wet, should be hung when storing and drying.

entry.title: Kubrick T-Shirt Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 80.00

Now available in black, the new T-shirt shape in soft touch fabric and designed for a loose, full coverage fit. The Kubrick T-shirt's lightweight feel creates a delicate drape that flatters the body. At the back, Technical taping frames the breathable mesh paneling. A great layering piece.

Made from 93% Lyocell 7% Elastane.

entry.title: Performance 7/8 Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Leggings
Price: 85.00

Figure-enhancing workout staple that lifts and elongates. The tight-weave wicking fabric, faced waistband, internal structural layer at the rear and inner-thigh ventilation panels create a supportive, comfortable and uniquely flattering fit. Key zip pocket embedded within yoke to add further functional details. Made from 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 80.00

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Satin One Piece
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Performance One Pieces
Price: 115.00

A new sleeveless bodysuit made in our luxurious Performance Stretch Satin fabric with an internal bra and brief lining for support and coverage. Combining our signature compression fabric on the lower body with the new Performance Stretch Satin at the bust makes this a unique design for a stand out look. Mesh cut outs have been strategically placed at the waist for extra breathability while adding contour lines. Wear this for low-mid intensity workouts by itself or style it to-and-from the gym. Main: Matte & Bra Lining: 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.Main Satin: 87% Polyester, 13% Elastane. Mesh: 88% Polyamide, 12% Elastane.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small. This style runs small - Please size up.

entry.title: Satin Bomber Jacket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 170.00

The Satin Bomber Jacket is the ultimate transitional style, made from luxurious and eye catching performance stretch satin fabric. Inspired by the satin silks used in Boxing and Jockey uniforms, this jacket merges the classic bomber look with high performance detailing. Features reflective back strips for visibility and elasticated hem and sleeves for comfort. Main Satin: 87% Polyamide, 13% Elastane. Matte: 59% Polyamide, 41% Elastane.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small
